Key Match Events: Ravindra Jadeja took 3 crucial wickets to turn the match in India's favor
Virat Kohli and KL Rahul combined for a 165-run stand for the fourth wicket
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at the MA Chidambaram Stadium in Chennai
India skittled Australia out for 199 on a wicket that ultimately proved to be conducive to spin
Others: India take on Afghanistan next in their World Cup fixture in Delhi on Wednesday before the marquee clash against Pakistan in Ahmedabad on October 14. Australia, meanwhile, square off against South Africa in Lucknow on Thursday.
